name: DeploymentPipelines-Deploy
friendlyName: Deploy content in a deployment pipeline
description: Deploy content in a Power BI deployment pipeline
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: pipeline
inputs.label: Pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a pipeline name or ID.

inputs.name: waitForCompletion
inputs.label: Next task starts only after the deployment is completed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uncheck to skip waiting for the deployment to complete.

inputs.name: deployType
inputs.label: Artifacts to deploy
inputs.helpMarkDown: When choosing selective deployment at least one of the artifacts must be provided.

inputs.name: dataflows
inputs.label: Dataflows
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name or ID of the dataflow to be deployed. For multiple artifacts split with semicolon (;).

inputs.name: datasets
inputs.label: Datasets
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name or ID of the dataset to be deployed. For multiple artifacts split with semicolon (;).

inputs.name: reports
inputs.label: Reports
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name or ID of the report to be deployed, for multiple artifacts split with ;

inputs.name: dahsboards
inputs.label: Dashboards
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name or ID of the dashboard to be deployed, for multiple artifacts split with ;

inputs.name: createNewWS
inputs.label: Create new workspace if needed?
inputs.helpMarkDown: When deploying into a stage without an assigned workspace, this name will be used to create the workspace. If the stage has an assigned workspace, this name will be ignored.

inputs.name: capacity
inputs.label: Capacity
inputs.helpMarkDown: When empty the source stage capacity will be used if possible. If the source stage capacity can't be used, another capacity the user has access to will be used.

inputs.name: allowCreateArtifact
inputs.label: Allow the deployment to create new artifacts in the target workspace.

inputs.name: allowOverwriteArtifact
inputs.label: Allow the deployment to overwrite existing artifacts in the target workspace.

inputs.name: updateApp
inputs.label: Update the app in the target workspace.

inputs.name: allowOverwriteTargetArtifactLabel
inputs.label: Allow the deployment to change the artifact's information protection label in the target workspace.

inputs.name: allowPurgeData
inputs.label: Allow the deployment to delete data from the dataset in the target workspace.

inputs.name: allowSkipTilesWithMissingPrerequisites
inputs.label: Allow the deployment not to copy tiles that are missing their dataset or report in target workspace.

inputs.name: allowTakeOver
inputs.label: Allow the deployment to change ownership of paginated reports in the target workspace.
